channel.title: Client help?!?!
channel.description:
ok i FINALLY got everything working. including the source/client. but now i have a new problem!... ok my source/client doesnt automatically save player user names.. this allows me to be unable to make myself as admin... any help?
another problem im running into is making npc droping what i want and the possibility of the drop... any help?
final problem im running into is adjusting the player starter items and level adjusment to how many xp i want for each level... any help>?
